title: Sensor Network
description: Deploy sensors to try to detect Reclaimers.
mission_objective: Have 3[symbol] on this mission: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.09

rules.text: When a feature comes into play at one of these locations, you may attach this mission to it.
When a feature with this mission attached is cleared, place 1[symbol] on this mission.
If this mission is attached, exhaust a non-human being. »» Unattach this mission unless a ranger spends 1 FOC energy.

title: Trail of Vines
description: You might be able to track the mysterious Verdessian through its effects on local flora.
mission_objective: Have 2R or more vine tokens on this card: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.11

rules.text: When a flora comes into play, place 1 vine token on it.
When a card with vine tokens on it is cleared, move those tokens here.
It must have come this way. Move 1 vine token from a flora to another flora.
A residual energy causes the plant to grow rapidly. Add 1 vine token to a flora.
Did those plants just... nip at you?! Each ranger suffers fatigue equal to the number of vine tokens within reach.

title: Find the Nest
description: To study the Reclaimers you will first have to track one of the creatures back to their nest. Since you can't keep up with them on foot, you will have to tag them with sap and let Gus the mole sniff out the trail for you.

rules.text: FOC + [symbol]: Affix [2] a tracking sap to a Reclaimer to attach this mission card to a Reclaimer Seeker in play.
Discard an active Reclaimer Seeker. If this mission is attached to it, Gus follows the tagged creature. »» [Campaign Log Entry] 1.15

title: Remove the Reclaimers
description: Search the Valley for options on how to deal with the mounting reclaimer invasion before it overwhelms the Valley.

rules.text: There are three different options to discover. Talk with people around the Valley who you think might have ideas for how to find them.

title: Lost Brother
description: Aell fled into the southern swamps. If you can find him, perhaps you can get him to create another flood.
mission_objective: Use [Campaign Log Entry] 1.19 instead of the normal entries for Aell, Ambitious Shaper.

rules.text: Find a way to travel to the Marsh of Rebirth and locate Aell.

title: Worm Food
description: Set up lures around the swamp.
mission_objective: Have 2[symbol] on this mission: [Campaign Log Entry] 1.24

rules.text: When a feature comes into play at one of these locations, you may attach this mission to it.
When feature with this mission attached is cleared, add 1[symbol] to this mission.
If this mission is attached, exhaust a non-human being. »» Unattach this mission unless a ranger spends 1 FOC energy.
